metadata.title: CVE-2024-26964 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:xhci: Add error handling in xhci_map_urb_for_dma Currentlyxhci_map_urb_for_dma() creates a temporary buffer and copies the SG list tothe new linear buffer. But if the kzalloc_node() fails, then the followingsg_pcopy_to_buffer() can lead to crash since it tries to memcpy to NULLpointer. So return -ENOMEM if kzalloc returns null pointer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
